description:
There's no question that drop shipping is an extremely profitable way to make money reselling products. In my opinion, having your own website is even better, and here's why...


Benefits to having your own site:

  • no profit sharing - sites like eBay take 10%, so you need to have a large profit margin/mark up to make money, but not with your own site. 
  • all the traffic is yours - every purchase on your site goes to you, no one else as all the products are yours
  • flexibility in pricing - no one to undercut as buyers don't see other comparable items at the same time. 
  • ability to make a niche store - contrary to eBay (well you can a little bit) you can conquer one niche and increase profits.... ex: gardening tools website
  • sell your website - if at any point you feel you want to stop or it isn't working out, a solid drop shipping website will sell for at least 2 thousands dollars... if you're smart there's a whole other business there!
  • no restrictions - It is your site. You do what you want. 
  • lower cost - Wait, what? Yes, setting up a site costs money, but paying 13% (eBay and PayPal) on just two sales that are around $100 is $26, which is more than the cost of a website. 


If you take the course and decide having your own website isn't for you, then you can get a no questions asked, 30 day refund!


Look forward to seeing you in my course!

-Andrew Burich
title: Dropshipping: New Way to Make the Most Money Drop Shipping.
